title: Ocean View
discription: A cozy economy room with stunning views of the ocean. Perfect for couples looking for comfort and affordability near the waves.

title: Sunset Suite
discription: Enjoy panoramic sunset views in this luxurious suite designed for solo travelers. Features elegant d√©cor and premium amenities.

title: Beachfront Bliss
discription: Spacious standard room just steps away from the beach. Ideal for small families or groups seeking comfort and convenience.

title: Coastal Retreat
discription: Affordable yet stylish room with coastal charm. Great for couples or friends looking to unwind by the sea.

title: Seaside Hevens
discription: A high-end seaside suite with luxurious furnishings and a serene ambiance. Perfect for those seeking indulgence by the water.

title: Tropical Escape
discription: A vibrant room inspired by tropical vibes, ideal for two adults looking to relax and reconnect in a cozy setting.
